Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI is helpful because it can check my answers against the rubric before I hand it in. However, AI can be prone to inaccuracies and is biased towards telling me what I want to hear.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback given by AI doesn't feel personal, so I don't feel upset by negative feedback, but I don't feel as encouraged by positive feedback either.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI can go into much more detail if needed, whereas teachers don't have enough time to give detailed feedback to every student on every assignment. However, AI can be biased towards telling me what I want to hear and may not be as critical as necessary.
